|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI M2 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Zero |revision = v1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 25, 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Banana_Pi_BPI_M2_Zero |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H2+; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646D-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.113;Ubuntu 16.04.2;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 LE, mini HDMI output, CSI, GPIO, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2017 |estprice = 15 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0791DZXLW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :'''Banana Pi BPI-M2 Zero''' board *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H2+ @1.0GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) :GPU: ''Mali-400 MP2'' @600MHz, OpenGL ES 2.0, H.265/HEVC *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM (shared with GPU) *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK]] AP6212, BT 4.0, SDIO (option AP6181, AP6335) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port
*Audio outputs: HDMI *Video Input: A CSI input connector :Camera: Supports 8-bit YUV422 CMOS sensor interface, :Supports CCIR656 protocol for NTSC and PAL, :Supports SM pixel camera sensor, :Supports video capture solution up to 1080p @30fps *Video outputs: Supports HDMI output w/ HDCP, CEC, 3D function, :Integrated CVBS, Supports simultaneous output of HDMI and CVBS
*GPIO: 40x pins header, compatible w/ Raspberry Pi B+ *OS: Android, Ubuntu, Raspberry Pi Image *LED: Power Led & Status Led *Power: 5V/2A via Micro USB
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi#Banana_Pi_BPI-M2_Zero ''Banana Pi BPI-M2 Zero'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M2_ZERO ''Banana Pi BPI-M2 ZERO'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/Sinovoip_Banana_Pi_M2_Zero ''Sinovoip Banana Pi M2 Zero'' on '''Sunxi''' Wiki]
